data.name: Ragnarock - DragonForce - "Heart Demolition"
data.detailed_description:
Includes the song for Ragnarock:
  • DragonForce - "Heart Demolition" - [05:39] - Difficulty 4/6/8
Also includes a new Hellfest environment and a new Hellfest longship.

This song is also part of the Hellfest RAID: Play 11 new epic tracks by bands from the 2022 Hellfest line-up, including The Offspring and Nightwish. Collect the unique Hellfest Hammer by playing all songs from the pack!

Please note DLC songs can be played in solo or in public/private multiplayer, only with other players who own the same song.

data.short_description: Get the song DragonForce - "Heart Demolition" for Ragnarock. Also includes the Hellfest environment and the Hellfest longship. Go be a rock star on stage!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
